main

Class GameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    GameEnvironment is the central class to the game having all game related objects as its members. The main entry point for the program is from GameEnvironment. It then calls GameSetup to instantiate some of it's members. Throughout much of the application GameEnvironment is used as an argument to pass context to the game state, such as in GameEvent.

        crewMemberA - pilot
